DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to track surgical outcomes and post-operative course in patients 55 years of age or older treated for ankle fractures.
DOC.brief_title: Ankle Fracture Treatment in the Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: This study seeks to describe and track surgical outcomes associated with the use of a minimally invasive surgical technique used to treat ankle fractures in at-risk patients 55 years of age or older
DOC.criteria: at least 55 years of age at time of surgery receiving treatment for ankle fractures
DOC.keyword: Ankle Fracture in at-risk elderly population
